title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\HiveJob
name: HiveJob
description:
A Dataproc job for running Apache Hive queries on YARN.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.HiveJob

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.query_file_uri
params.description: The HCFS URI of the script that contains Hive queries.

params.name: data.continue_on_failure
params.description: Optional. Whether to continue executing queries if a query fails. The default value is false. Setting to true can be useful when executing independent parallel queries.

params.name: data.script_variables
params.description: Optional. Mapping of query variable names to values (equivalent to the Hive command: SET name="value";).

params.name: data.properties
params.description: Optional. A mapping of property names and values, used to configure Hive. Properties that conflict with values set by the Dataproc API may be overwritten. Can include properties set in /etc/hadoop/conf/*-site.xml, /etc/hive/conf/hive-site.xml, and classes in user code.

params.name: data.jar_file_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS URIs of jar files to add to the CLASSPATH of the Hive server and Hadoop MapReduce (MR) tasks. Can contain Hive SerDes and UDFs.
